title: Lizzie Cundy, 50, channels Baywatch in a plunging red swimsuit at the beach in Marbella
text:
She jetted to Marbella over the weekend.

And, Lizzie Cundy looked sensational as she chanelled Baywatch in a plunging red swimsuit as she enjoyed a day at the beach in Marbella, on Sunday.

The former WAG, 50, showcased her lean legs and surgically-enhanced chest in the jaw-dropping one-piece, which boasted pretty ruffle detailing.

Babe watch: Lizzie Cundy, 50, looked sensational as she chanelled Baywatch in a plunging red swimsuit as she enjoyed a day at the beach in Marbella, on Sunday

The television personality covered up somewhat, by wrapping a lacy red sarong from Pretty Pink Princess around her waist as she strode across the sand.

Lizzie accessorised with a smattering of delicate bracelets and glamorous over-sized sunglasses, while her brunette tresses were freshly blown.

Meanwhile, the radio presenter looked smitten as she posed with Jeremy Gordeno at the National Reality TV Awards 2019 at Porchester Hall in London on Monday night.

The radio presenter showed off her slender figure in a tight nude-coloured semi-sheer dress as she told MailOnline they're talking about having a double wedding with her BFF Anthea Turner and her new fiancé Mark Armstrong.

Speaking to MailOnline, the star expressed her delight at her pal Anthea getting married and said they have spoken about sharing the day.

Anthea confirmed her engagement to her businessman beau at the end of last month, after a romantic proposal in Rome.

Meanwhile, speaking at an event last week, an insider told MailOnline: 'Lizzie and Jeremy have definitely put the dramas of his ex behind them. They looked smitten and danced the night away.'

Lizzie and Jeremy got back together earlier this month after the businessman 'worked hard to get her back'.

A source close to the couple told MailOnline: 'Lizzie and Jeremy are back together after a little break.

'He worked hard to win her back after a tricky patch and eventually won her around.

'Jeremy has promised Lizzie all the drama with his ex is well and truly behind them and they’re looking forward to a new chapter together.’

Lizzie made her relationship with Jeremy public earlier this year, after breaking her silence on a row with his ex-fiancée, Candice Hodge.
